thread.title: Next week's What's Brewing? event will explore Louisville air travel
thread.title_full: Next week's What's Brewing? event will explore Louisville air travel

author: Marty Finley
title: Next week's What's Brewing? event will explore Louisville air travel
text: Next week's What's Brewing? event will explore Louisville air travel Jul 7, 2015, 2:04pm EDT File photo Air travel in Louisville is the topic of Louisville Business First's What's Brewing?â€¦ more The subject of a recent cover story in Louisville Business First will take center stage at the Kentucky International Convention Center at 221 S 4th St. a week from today. Business First will host its latest What's Brewing? breakfast event on Tuesday, July 14, where we will discuss ways air travel can be improved for business travelers in the Louisville area. Business First managing editor Cary Stemle will lead a panel discussion with Jim Welch , vice chairman of Louisville-based Brown-Forman Corp. (NYSE:BFB) and chairman of the Louisville Regional Airport Authority board of directors; Jonathan Blue , chairman and managing director of Blue Equity LLC and a member of Greater Louisville Inc.'s Regional Air Coalition; and Skip Miller , executive director of the Louisville Regional Airport Authority. The panelists will talk about what challenges exist and what opportunities are possible to improve air travel for businesspeople who live and work in the Louisville region. After the interview, the audience will be able to ask questions of the panelists. Related Content
